Getting Started/getting-started.title: Tutorial Intro
Getting Started/getting-started.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

Post Platform Guide/getting-started.title: Getting Started with Platform Development
Post Platform Guide/getting-started.description: This guide will help you get started building platforms in the metastate ecosystem. We'll cover the essential concepts and patterns you'll need to implement, using @eCurrency-api as a reference example.

Post Platform Guide/mapping-rules.title: Mapping Rules
Post Platform Guide/mapping-rules.description: This document explains how to create mappings for the web3-adapter system, which enables data exchange between different platforms using a universal ontology.

Post Platform Guide/webhook-controller.title: Webhook Controller Guide
Post Platform Guide/webhook-controller.description: The webhook controller receives awareness protocol packets from the eVault system and saves them to your local database.
